resources.string: Build version %1$s (%2$d) © eFur 2024 | All Rights Reserved | 30796 SLOC
The Google Play services are required to use this app!
Login, register or continue as a guest
Please login or register to continue
By continuing you confirm that you have read and agree to the Terms of Service and the Privacy Policy:
Accept both the Privacy Policy and the Terms of Service to register
Set your date of birth to register
Are you a resident of the EU/EEA, United Kingdom or the state of California in USA?
The app contains ads. Do you want them to be personalised (relevant to you)?
You are about to register an account using %1$s. An email will be sent to this address to confirm it.\n\nContinue?
An account is needed to perform this action!

This will send a password reset email to "%1$s".
Click on the link in the email to reset your password

Do you want to continue?
A password reset email was sent to \"%1$s\"
Are you sure that you want to log out?
An error occurred while cropping the image, please try again
You can\'t add a comic to a comic!
The image or GIF to upload
Something went wrong with the selected file
You have no upload quota left, please wait %1$d minutes!
You can only upload %1$d MB with %2$d quota. Wait %3$d minutes or choose smaller files!
Write a title or some content!
Your account is set to Safe content only
Your account is set to Safe and Suggestive content only
A file you are trying to upload is larger than 100 MB. Crop it or choose a smaller file.
The video you are trying to upload is larger than 100 MB. Compress it or choose a smaller file.
You must select at least one file to upload
Suggestive - suggestive content, tasteful/artistic nudity or mature themes
Post will not be visible in the New section
Makes a reasonable effort to prevent the post media from being downloaded by other users
Commenting will be disabled for this post
Add up to 100 tags describing the post
You have not enabled any sensitive content.\n\nUpdate your preferences at Settings->Content preferences
You can select at most three categories
You can\'t add more than 100 tags
This post is part of a comic
The post will be added to the comic you select
Add the post to this comic?
Are you sure that you want to delete this comic?\nThe posts will not be deleted.
Drag and drop pages to change the order. Don\'t forget to press the save icon when done!
Remove this page from the comic?
Link the post to this fursona?
Are you sure that you want to delete this fursona?
This area is a work in progress :)\n\nHere you will be able to search for tags, posts, users and more
Enter tags separated by a space.\nExample: \"dog digital_art\" will search for posts containing both tags \"dog\" and \"digital_art\"
Match any of the selected categories
Match any of the selected themes
Match any of the selected sensitive themes
Failed to load. Tap to try again.\n\n%1$s
Failed to load. Tap to try again.
Press the back button again to exit!
To use all features you need to verify your account.\n\nCheck your inbox at %1$s and enter the code that was sent to you below.
Did you not receive an email? Click the button below to send a new code
A code has been sent to your email
Success! Your account has been verified
Forgot your account password?\n\n1. Enter your email below to get started with creating a new password.
2. Enter your new password and the code you received by email below.
A code has been sent to your email
Success! Your account password has been changed
Press to start the verification process
Change your name, set an icon and more
Are you sure you want to ignore this update?
Are you sure you want to delete this message?
The other user has deleted their account, do you want to delete this chat?
Do you want to delete this conversation and all messages?
Once you join a chat it will appear here.\n\nStart a chat in the upper right corner!
Start a chat with another user.\nEnter their username below or go to their profile and use the Message button to start a chat
%1$s changed the group type to public
%1$s changed the group type to private
%1$s changed the group rating to Adult (18+)
%1$s changed the group rating to Safe
Unknown message - check for app updates
You have been removed from this chat
You have been banned from this chat.
You have been kicked from this chat.
%1$s (%2$s) wants to chat with you.\n\nAccept invite?
You have been invited to join the group chat \"%1$s\".\n\nAccept invite?
Confirm that you want to join this chat

Delete all messages and media?

This will delete everything in this chat for all members.

This action is irreversible and may take a few minutes to complete.
Leave this chat?\n\nYou might not be able to join again without an invite.
Delete this chat?\n\nAll messages and media will be deleted and all members will be kicked.
Mute this chat?\n\nYou will no longer receive push notifications for new messages.
Unmute this chat?\n\nYou will receive push notifications for new messages.
Anyone can find and join this chat. The chat history is public.
Invite only. The chat will not be publicly visible.
Chat contains only Safe content - users of all ages can join.
Chat contains explicit content - only 18+ users can join.
Sharing has been disabled for this post
Commenting on my posts & replying to my comments
Are you sure that you want to delete this comment?
Make this log visible to admins only?
This post is rated higher than your max rating!
Welcome to the eFur project!\n\nA social space to share and enjoy all things furry ~
Have feedback or suggestions to improve the app? Leave a rating in the Play store, send an email to feedback@efurry.net, or join the Discord and share your thoughts there!
If you contribute, send @Dog a message!
You can help translate the app into another language!
Need to contact an admin or want help with the app? Send an email to support@efurry.net or contact one of the moderators below!
We have a Discord channel and a Telegram group! Join to chat with other users and moderators and get assistance with anything.
You are about to open the external URL %1$s\n\nContinue?
Support the app by purchasing eFurry Premium and level up your account or gift it to another user!
Purchase eFurry Premium to remove all ads in the app and gain an increased upload quota.
Level up your account and get a badge next to your name showing your support for the app!
Failed to load items - tap to retry
Your recent purchases. Once a purchase is made you need to either activate it for your own account or gift it to someone else.
No purchases found - tap to reload
Failed to load purchases - tap to retry
Do you want to activate this purchase for your own account or gift it to someone else?\n\n%1$s x %2$d
This will activate the purchase for %1$s (%2$s).\n\nContinue?
Success! Your purchase was gifted to %1$s
Success! Your purchase has been activated!
Your post was deleted by a moderator
Your comment was deleted by a moderator
Full account ban lifted or expired
Create posts ban lifted or expired
Start new chats ban lifted or expired
Edit icon/background ban lifted or expired
Profile edits ban lifted or expired
Report content ban lifted or expired
Follow users ban lifted or expired
Premium has been activated for %1$d month(s)
Update the app to view this notification!
You are not receiving push notifications for messages or comments. Click here to allow the app to send push notifications.
It\'s empty here…\n\n Leave a comment and make someone happy!
This comment has been deleted by its author
This comment has been deleted by the post owner
This comment has been deleted by a moderator
Comments have been disabled for this post
You will never see this comment again. This action cannot be undone.
Delete this comment? This cannot be undone.
Delete this post? This cannot be undone.
Add this post to the News section?
Remove this post from the News section?
You will never see this post again. This action cannot be undone.
Promote this user to a moderator?
Mark this user\'s account as pending deletion?
Update the app to view this post!
Failed to get vote: %1$s. Please try again
The feed is empty,\nfollow users to see their new posts here!
Do you want to block the tag \"%1$s\"?\nPosts with this tag will be hidden.
Long posts are cropped, tap to view the full size
Failed to get profile. Click to retry
Success, you are no longer following this user
Do you want to unfollow this deleted account?
Other users can mention you with @your_username.\nAllowed characters: a-z A-Z _-. and 0–9
Not an image or GIF file!
I want to see posts made by:
Your birthdate is never shown to other users. Once set, it can only be changed by a moderator.
Your birthdate is locked. Contact a moderator if you need to change it

If you are 18+ you can have two profiles. One general that is visible to all users and one adult (NSFW) profile that is only visible to users that are 18+.\n\nYour general profile must be safe for work while the after dark (AD/NSFW) profile can contain explicit and adult material.
Manage what type of content you want to see in the app. Disable an item to hide all posts in that category
Visible by default. Uncheck to hide.
Some kinks can only be managed on the website: %1$s
Sensitive content is hidden unless you enable it. Check an item in the list if you want to see or upload posts in that category.
Missing a category? Send @Dog a message!
Separate tags you want to block with a space or newline. Posts containing any of these tags will be hidden.
Crash reports are collected and sent to Firebase Crashlytics
Crash reports are disabled and are not sent to Firebase Crashlytics
If you need to change the email address used to login to your account with you can do so here.\n\nCurrent email: %1$s

To confirm the email change, please enter the new email again.

Current email: %1$s
New email: %2$s
Here you can delete your account and all of its data.\n\nThis action is irreversible.
Are you sure? All your posts will be deleted when you confirm.
Are you sure? All your comments will be deleted when you confirm.
Are you sure? All your messages will be deleted when you confirm.
Are you sure? Confirming will deactivate your account. One month from now all your posts, comments, messages and all other data will be deleted.
Success! Your posts will be deleted. This may take a while if you have many. Click on the refresh icon to check the progress.
Success! Your comments will be deleted. This may take a while if you have many. Click on the refresh icon to check the progress.
Success! Your messages will be deleted. This may take a while if you have many. Click on the refresh icon to check the progress.
Success! Your account has been scheduled for deletion. Check your inbox for more details. Your account is now deactivated.
Success! Your account has been reactivated and is no longer pending deletion.
When you press the \"Send account deletion request\" button, your account will be deactivated and marked as pending deletion. An email will be sent to your inbox that confirms the deletion request.

Your account will remain deactivated for one month before we process your deletion request. During this time, if you change your mind and want your account back you need to either press the \"Cancel account deletion request\" button or send an email to support@efurry.net to cancel the deletion.
When one month has passed, your account will be deleted from our servers. Once this happens you will be notified via email.
Note: once your account has been deleted, your username becomes free for others to use.

You need to verify your email address first!

Click on the link that was sent to %1$s and then try again or restart the app.

If you have not received an email, log out and log in again and you should receive a new one.
Grant media permission for easier\ngallery access
You have not blocked any users
No users found with a name or username starting with \"%1$s\"
No users found with a name or username starting with \"%1$s\".\n\nError: %2$s
Search in post titles, descriptions, texts, artists and tags. The search is case-insensitive.
